message:
GRAPHIC VIDEO: Video released today shows Tulsa police shooting and killing Terence Crutcher, an UNARMED father of 4 and college student for the crime of having his car stall down on the road. His hands are raised shortly before shots are fired. From the helicopter, a cop can be heard on the radio saying, "That looks like a bad dude, too." A federal Justice Department investigation has been launched and the officer who shot him has been suspended.

Video by Occupy Democrats, LIKE our page for more.
Read more here: http://abcn.ws/2cUhI6I
